original_text: And he brought the meat offering, and took an handful thereof, and burnt it upon the altar, beside the burnt sacrifice of the morning.
korean_text: 또 소제를 드리되 그 중에서 그의 손에 한 움큼을 채워서 아침 번제물에 더하여 제단 위에서 불사르고

sentences.original_text: And he brought the meat offering,
and burnt it upon the altar,
beside the burnt sacrifice of the morning.
